body.name: Anti-Theft Video Doorbell Door Mount Compatible with Ring Video Doorbell 4/3/3 Plus/2/1/(2020 Release), No-Drill Mounting Bracket Holder Accessories for Home Rentals Office Room
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 22 mins
features: 【Anti-Theft Design】Our anti-theft doorbell door mount is specifically designed to provide a secure environment for your video doorbell. It ensures the safety of your family by effectively wrapping your video doorbell in a 360° manner, protecting it from theft. Please note: This just a doorbell mount, Doorbell is NOT included.

【Compatible with Most Video Doorbell Models】Our door mount is perfectly compatible with a wide range of video doorbell brands. It is designed to fit Video Doorbell 1, Video Doorbell 2, Video Doorbell 3, Video Doorbell 3 Plus, Video Doorbell 4, Video Doorbell 2020, Video Doorbell 2021, Video Doorbell Pro, Video Doorbell Pro2, and most other video doorbells. It accommodates dimensions of up to 2.52 inches wide x 5.27 inches tall x 1.18 inches deep.

【Suitable for Various Door Types】Our door mount is suitable for different types of doors, including anti-theft doors, inward-opening doors, and doors that open on either the left or right side. Please note that it is not suitable for outward-opening doors. The door thickness should be between 0.6 inches and 2.3 inches. We recommend measuring your door's thickness before making a purchase.

【No-Drill Installation】Installing our anti-theft doorbell door mount is quick and hassle-free. Simply place your video doorbell inside the protective shell, adjust the fixed clip according to your door thickness, and attach the mount to the side of the door. Finally, secure it in place using the two provided screws. There is no need to drill into the door or wall, making the installation process easy and convenient.

【Package Includes】The package includes 1x video doorbell mount, installation instructions, and various installation accessories. If you encounter any issues with the received product or during installation, please don't hesitate to contact us. We are committed to resolving any problems you may have in a timely manner.

reviews.reviewText: It’s perfect for me. I’m able to position my ring to view exactly what I want.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The good: I like that there is an opening in the back where the charging port to the ring decide is located. It’s easy to assemble and comes with everything you need to safely hold the device. However, I wish they added a little length. I had to cut out some weather stripping because camera is very close to the edge of the door. It would be nice if this were adjustable or if there was more length so there would be no concern there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Holds the Camera
reviews.reviewText: I've begun stepping out of the stone age and purchasing some of the modern gear that appears to be owned by everyone, such as a doorbell camera. I bought this wall mount to put at my front door, and it looked easy to install.Although it is made of plastic rather than metal, it does not seem secure enough to my satisfaction, even though it seemed to be of reasonable quality. It is also annoying that in order to charge the ring, you have to remove it from its holder. It is suitable for people on a budget because it is affordable and gets the job done well.

reviews.reviewerName: It is hard for me to get it started. The micro instructions are printed too small. I’m a senior. Please make it simpler

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This takes care of people ripping off the Ring doorbell!
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought a Ring doorbell because I was so sick and tired of the delivery person claiming they had delivered my package, and then my orders would seemingly grow legs and disappear. But, I'd also seen people walk up to people's Ring doorbells and hit them from off their house or the door , knocking the Ring doorbell down and damaging it.So, I looked for a protective cover and this really does a great job. It's very easy to assemble, and all you need to worry about is adjusting it to your preferred height and then recharging the doorbell whenever you need to. I can see how it might be annoying for someone to have to unscrew the case and take the Ring out and charge it, but if you have the settings done right, you shouldn't need to take it down but every couple of months until the next time.Very simple invention and does the trick!
